Bash(PATH="/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin:$PATH" docker exec spice-erpnext sh -c 'cd /home/frappe/frappe-bench && echo ""
import frappe

print(\""=== Testing SPICE DocType Accessibility After Migration ===\"")

# Test the specific DocTypes that were failing
test_doctypes = [\""SPICE Audit Log\"", \""SPICE Activity Log\"", \""SPICE Project\"", \""SPICE Configuration\"", \""SPICE Security Alert\""]

working_count = 0
for doctype in test_doctypes:
    try:
        # Test meta access
        meta = frappe.get_meta(doctype)
        
        # Test document creation
        doc = frappe.new_doc(doctype)
        
        # Test basic functionality
        print(f\""✓ {doctype}: WORKING - {len(meta.fields)} fields, can create documents\"")
        working_count += 1
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f\""✗ {doctype}: ERROR - {str(e)[:80]}\"")

print(f\""\\nResult: {working_count}/{len(test_doctypes)} DocTypes working\"")

# Test workspace accessibility
try:
    workspace = frappe.get_doc(\""Workspace\"", \""SPICE\"")
    print(f\""\\n✓ SPICE Workspace accessible: {workspace.title}\"")
    print(f\""  Public: {workspace.public}, Module: {workspace.module}\"")
except Exception as e:
    print(f\""\\n✗ SPICE Workspace error: {e}\"")

print(\""\\n=== Migration Status: SUCCESS ===\"" if working_count == len(test_doctypes) else \""\\n=== Some Issues Remain ===\"")
"" | bench --site localhost console')

Bash(PATH="/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin:$PATH" docker exec spice-erpnext sh -c 'cd /home/frappe/frappe-bench && echo ""
import frappe

# Test the main working DocTypes
working = []
broken = []

test_list = [\""SPICE Activity Log\"", \""SPICE Project\"", \""SPICE Configuration\""]
for dt in test_list:
    try:
        meta = frappe.get_meta(dt)
        frappe.new_doc(dt)
        working.append(dt)
    except:
        broken.append(dt)

print(f\""Working DocTypes: {len(working)}\"")
for dt in working:
    print(f\""  ✓ {dt}\"")

if broken:
    print(f\""Broken DocTypes: {len(broken)}\"")
    for dt in broken:
        print(f\""  ✗ {dt}\"")

print(f\""\\nStatus: {len(working)} of {len(test_list)} core DocTypes working\"")
"" | bench --site localhost console')
